turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Freshly Brewed Pikes Place Coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to place the order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the Starbucks at Coit and Legacy in Plano, TX

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the Venti size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to add to your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you add 5 creams and 3 Splenda packets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want decaf or regular coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like regular

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything other drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, just the one coffee drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you add a cheese danish?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem...anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be $6, how would you like to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please charge it to my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How will you pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be coming to the drive through in 5 minutes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Your order will be ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, I will see you shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. See you soon.
